description:
It's easier than you think!

Have you ever watched a magician on TV and thought to yourself how cool it would be to be able to do what they do?

Here is a complete beginner's video course that will teach you 21 amazing magic tricks that are easy to do, and with items you can find around the home!

For children and adults alike!

LEARN A VARIETY OF TRICKS WITH CARDS, DICE, FRUIT, PAPER, CUPS AS WELL AS MIND READING EFFECTS!
title: Learn Easy Magic Tricks and become a Magician!
